member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX
member.summary: The PROV_ENUMALGS_EX structure is used with the function when the PP_ENUMALGS_EX parameter is retrieved to contain information about an algorithm supported by a cryptographic service provider (CSP).

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.aiAlgid
member.summary: One of the ALG_ID values that identifies the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.dwDefaultLen
member.summary: The default key length, in bits, of the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.dwMinLen
member.summary: The minimum key length, in bits, of the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.dwMaxLen
member.summary: The maximum key length, in bits, of the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.dwProtocols
member.summary: Zero or a combination of one or more of the Protocol Flags values that identifies the protocols supported by the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.dwNameLen
member.summary: The length, in CHARs, of the szName string. This length includes the terminating null character.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.szName
member.summary: A null-terminated ANSI string that contains the name of the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.dwLongNameLen
member.summary: The length, in CHARs, of the szLongName string. This length includes the terminating null character.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS_EX.szLongName
member.summary: A null-terminated ANSI string that contains the long name of the algorithm.
